Thank you for you report. We need some e: Asanti kwa reporti yako.Tuna hitaji habari zaidi kuhusu ajali. Tafadhali tujulishe ukipiga {{ USSD_number }}
Welcome! Would you like to find out abou: Karibu! Je ungependa kujua kuhusu wakimbizi na haki ya wahamaji SA? Kwanza chagua lugha yako:

Kukupa maelezo na msaada unaohitaji tutafanya vifuatavyo:

Unakubali haya?
We're sorry, we can't help without you p: Samahani.Hatuwezi kukusaidia bila ridhaa ya kuhifadhi habari yako na kutumiwa SMSs. Ungependa kujua utakapofanya?
Find info about refugee/migrant rights i: Kupata maelezo kuhusu haki za wakimbizi na wahamiaji SA?
Would you like to find out if you qualif: Je ungependa kujua kama unastahili hadhi ya ukimbizi?
Yes, I want to find out if I qualify: Ndiyo, Nataka kujua kama mimi nastahili
No, I'd like to access information for m: Hapana, Ningepena kupata habari ya wahamaji
Have you fled from your country in fear: Je wewe umekimbia nchi yako kutokana na kunyanyaswa juu ya tofu, rangi, uraia, dini, gendi, siasa au kikundi cha jamii?
Are you married to or depend upon a pers: Umeolewa au unamtegemea mtu ambae ametoka nchi yake kwa sababu ya hofu?
Are you married to a recognised refugee?: Je umeolewa na mkimbizi aliepewa hadhi za wakimbizi?
It looks like you may qualify for refuge: Inaonekana kama unaweza kuhitimu kwa hadhi ya ukimbizi! Machakato hifadhi. Tafadhali anza maombi sasa hivi.
You don't qualify for refugee status in: Wewe huna haki ya kuwa na hadhi ya ukimbizi SA. Kama wewe ni mgeni na unatafuta kazi, masomo au biashara unahitaji visa.
Thank you for dialling into the refugee: Shukrani kwa kugipia shirika la haki za wakimbizi and wahamaji. Tafadhali rudi nyuma kwa maelezo zaidi.
Unfortunately you cannot submit a report: Kwa bahati mbaya huwezi kutowa ripoti bila kuonyesha na kuelewa sherry & masharti. Tafadhali piga ukajalibu tena.
Reports are used to see where attacks ma: Ripoti hutumiwa na LHR kutambua maeno ambao ana chuki za wageni. Kuwasiliana na polisi kwa kupata jibu la haraka. Haki zote zimehifadhiwa.
LHR treats these reports as serious & wi: Ripoti zinachukuliwa kama jambo la muhimu. LHR itakupigia kama majibu inawezekanavyo. Usitarajie jibu la haraka. Haki zote zimehifadhiwa.
Your details are confidential & used onl: Maelezo yako ni siri na hutumiwa na LHR kwa ajili ya uchunguzi. LHR itakupigia kama kuna jibu lolote litawezekana. Haki zote zimehifadhiwa.
LHR will process your info and try to re: LHR itachukua maelezo yako na kujaribu kukujibu mara kwa mara. Tafadhali usinyanyase idhaa hii. Haki zote zimehifadhiwa.
Which of these xenophobic acts is taking: Vitendo gani vya chuki za wageni vinafanyika?
South African Police Service: Kituo cha Polisi ya Afrika Kusini
Please type the name of the suburb in wh: Tafadhali andika majina ya mahali tukio hilo limetokea.
Sorry, we're not sure which suburb you m: Pole hamna matokeo ya eneo lako. Tafadhali ingiza eneo lako kwa makini na hakikisha kama unatumia herufu sahihi.
Please type an explanation of what's hap: Tafadhali tupe maelezo kinachoendelea pale. Je uko hatarini? Ama mtu mwingine? Toa maelezo maalum. Vitaweza kutusaidia kukuhudumia haraka.
Please type the full name of the person: Tafadhali andika majina kamili ya aliye fungwa. Pia, nini iliyosabisha afungwe. Na aina gani ya nyaraka/kibali anayo, kama ipo?
Please type a detailed explanation of th: Tafadhali andika maelezo kamili juu ya kile kilichotokea; wapi matukio; afisa mkosefu ni nani: jina lake; maumbile/sura yake ina fanana namna gani; siku, tarahe/dakika gani
Please explain the incident in as much d: Tafadhali eleza tukio hilo katika maelezo vile unaweza: Kilichotendeka; lipodendenka; Jina mhalifu. Jina/sifa za maumbile; Tarehe/wakati.
Sorry there are no results for your loca: Pole hamna matokeo ya eneo lako. Tafadhali ingiza eneo lako kwa makini na hakikisha kama unatumia herufu sahihi.
The system is looking up services near y: Mfumo ina angalia hadi huduma karibu na wewe. Kwa kawaida inachukua chini ya dakika moja.
Unfortunately we couldn't find any locat: Samahani hatuwezi kupata huduma ilio karibu na we. Jaribu tena au  toka?
Sorry, no nearby services available. You: Samahani, hamna huduma karibu na wewe. Unaweza kutumia orodha au fursa 'Huduma karibu na mimi' na kutafuta huduma mahali pengineo
Your SMS will be sent to you shortly. Do: Utatumiwa SMS baada ya muda mufupi . Usisahau piga tena {{ ussd_num }} ukapate taarifa zote unahitaji kuhusu namna kuomba visa  na kuishi katika SA.
When you registered, you were identified: Wakati ulijiandikisha, Ulitambuliwaa kama {{status}}. Una hakika ya kwamba unataka kubadilisha hadhi yako?
